item.title: Install Kubernetes 1.32 and Calico 3.29 for networking on multiple instances
item.description:
Security before installation

It’s best practices to run only Kubernetes on a dedicated server. Running any side applications or tuning applications that are used by the cluster may cause an impact in the Kubernetes itself and isn’t recommended/supported.

Kubernetes uses the whole iptables firewall, so any changes you make on the iptables can impact kubernetes and also be ruined by kubernetes.

At the end of this post we will visualize what actions Kubernetes is doing in the iptables, this will allow us to realize how sophisticated is its algorithm.
